Section.Paragraph: These appendices contain the basic task description provided to participant s (appendix A), the major documents contained in the final test package (appendice s B and C), some typical examples of MUC-4 messages and answer key template s (appendices D and E), the text and answer key templates for TST2-MUC4-0048, whic h is referred to in many of the papers in Part III of this proceedings (appendix F) , and tabular and graphic displays of the final test results (appendices G and H).
